meanings.sent1: We played catch in the ballpark.
meanings.sent2: The fans cheered loudly at the ballpark.

meanings.sent1: His guess was in the ballpark of the actual number.
meanings.sent2: The cost of the project was way off from the ballpark figure.

meanings.definition: To make an estimate or guess.
meanings.sent1: Can you ballpark the total cost for me?
meanings.sent2: I ballparked the time it would take to finish the task.
meanings.sent3: He tried to ballpark the number of jellybeans in the jar.
meanings.sent4: She ballparked the distance to be around five miles.
meanings.sent5: We need to ballpark the attendance for the event.
